Once upon a time, in a lush green pond, there lived a little frog named Ferdinand. Tired of his slimy skin and croaky voice, he longed to be a dashing prince. One moonlit night, he stumbled upon a wise old turtle who offered him a chance. "Speak your wish, and it shall be granted," she said. With a hopeful heart, Ferdinand croaked, "I wish to be a prince!" In a flash of light, he transformed into a handsome prince. However, he soon realized that royal duties were exhausting. Yearning for simplicity, Ferdinand returned to the pond, embracing his froggy life once more.
